text: Uski qaum issey jhagadne lagi to usne qaum se kaha â€œkya tumlog Allah ke maamle mein mujhse jhagadte ho? Halaanke usne mujhey raah e raast dikha di hai aur main tumhare thehraye huey shareekon se nahin darta. Haan agar mera Rubb kuch chahe to woh zaroor ho sakta hai. Mere Rubb ka ilm har cheez par chaya hua hai, phir kya tum hosh mein na aaogey
